body.p: The was designed as a subset of that can be integrated into another application under the terms of the SDK agreement to provide functionality for editing and authoring XML documents. The component can be embedded in a third-party standalone Java application or customized as a Java Web Applet to provide WYSIWYG-like XML editing directly in your web browser.
The startup project for Java Swing integrations is available online as a Maven archetype on the website. More information about the setup can be found on the Oxygen SDK page.
